name: @jaredlunde/react-picture
description: A <picture> component for React with some additional capabilities
author: Jared Lunde

scripts.build: yarn run build:es && yarn run build:cjs
scripts.build:es: rimraf es && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir es && npm run prettier:es
scripts.build:cjs: rimraf cjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --out-dir cjs && npm run prettier:cjs
scripts.build-pub: yarn run build && yarn publish --access public
